overlay.title: Green Prompting
overlay.subtitle: Efficiency is Eco-Friendly
overlay.intro: We often forget that "the cloud" runs on physical, power-hungry hardware. Every prompt triggers massive computations on energy-intensive GPUs.
overlay.problemText: Typing a vague prompt and spending 10 turns asking the AI to "fix it" isn't just frustrating‚Äîit's wasteful. This trial-and-error loop multiplies the energy cost of a single task by 10x.
overlay.solutionText: The Vibe Library focuses on "One-Shot" success. By using optimized templates (with context and logic built-in), you get the right result on the first try, reducing "inference churn" and saving energy.
overlay.stat1Text: A single LLM query consumes 10 to 50 times more energy than a standard Google search.
overlay.stat2Text: Generating one image or complex response can consume as much energy as charging a smartphone.
overlay.stat3Text: Inefficient workflows that rely on constant re-prompting can increase the carbon footprint of a task by 32x.
